mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from loca order by loca_num desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select cc.* from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from loca order by loca_num desc) tt where loca_addr like '%'||#{juso}||'%') cc where rn>=#{startNum} and rn <=#{endNum}
select count(*) as cnt from loca where loca_addr like '%'||#{juso}||'%'
select count(*) as cnt from loca
mapper.insert: update loca set loca_name =#{loca_name}, loca_addr=#{loca_addr}, loca_phone=#{loca_phone}, loca_img=#{loca_img}, loca_date=sysdate where loca_num=#{loca_num}
